name: ACameraRig_Crane
doc: A simple rig for simulating crane-like camera movements.

CranePitch: Controls the pitch of the crane arm.
CraneYaw: Controls the yaw of the crane arm.
CraneArmLength: Controls the length of the crane arm.
bLockMountPitch: Lock the mount pitch so that an attached camera is locked and pitched in the direction of the crane arm
bLockMountYaw: Lock the mount yaw so that an attached camera is locked and oriented in the direction of the crane arm
TransformComponent: Root component to give the whole actor a transform.
CraneCameraMount: Component to define the attach point for cameras.
